name: Kids Ambulance Driving Simulator
description:
Kids Ambulance Driving Simulator

The best ever Kids Ambulance Driving Simulator fun game for kids of 2016 is here.

Try yourself as a real rescue worker and feel on the practice, what is the Medical center delivery after accidents and how will an hospital-wagon save lives.

Do not forget that you are playing against not only the time, A map on the left-hand side shows where they are.

Test your patience, technical exciting levels, but will not accidentally open too fast crash!
Well, we challenge you to complete the 10 different levels of this game.
You should download this new free real riding game! With its amazing features and easy controls, It is the best among the other parking clinic wagongames!

This driving game and parking game in one will provide you endless fun.
It is also easy to control so it can easily be played by all ages. This free game is by far the best there is!

Features

- realistic city environment
- Help people in need
- Point-to-point driving objective
- Easy to pick up and play
